mapper.update:
update ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO
TXN_MDE = #{txnMde,jdbcType=CHAR},
RAP_TYP = #{rapTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
COM_NO = #{comNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
COM_NME = #{comNme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_KND = #{busKnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
TXN_ORG_CDE = #{txnOrgCde,jdbcType=CHAR},
TXN_TLR = #{txnTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
SUB_DTE = #{subDte,jdbcType=DATE},
EXE_DTE = #{exeDte,jdbcType=DATE},
BAT_STS = #{batSts,jdbcType=CHAR},
FLE_NME = #{fleNme,jdbcType=CHAR},
TOT_CNT = #{totCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TOT_AMT = #{totAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUC_TOT_CNT = #{sucTotCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUC_TOT_AMT = #{sucTotAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FAL_TOT_CNT = #{falTotCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FAL_TOT_AMT = #{falTotAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_CNT = #{payCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RSV_FLD1 = #{rsvFld1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD2 = #{rsvFld2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD3 = #{rsvFld3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD4 = #{rsvFld4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD5 = #{rsvFld5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD6 = #{rsvFld6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD7 = #{rsvFld7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD8 = #{rsvFld8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD9 = #{rsvFld9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EUPS_BUS_TYP = #{eupsBusTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where BAT_NO = #{batNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO
BAT_NO,
TXN_MDE,
RAP_TYP,
COM_NO,
COM_NME,
BUS_KND,
TXN_ORG_CDE,
TXN_TLR,
SUB_DTE,
EXE_DTE,
BAT_STS,
FLE_NME,
TOT_CNT,
TOT_AMT,
SUC_TOT_CNT,
SUC_TOT_AMT,
FAL_TOT_CNT,
FAL_TOT_AMT,
PAY_CNT,
RSV_FLD1,
RSV_FLD2,
RSV_FLD3,
RSV_FLD4,
RSV_FLD5,
RSV_FLD6,
RSV_FLD7,
RSV_FLD8,
RSV_FLD9,
EUPS_BUS_TYP
#{batNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{txnMde,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{rapTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{comNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{comNme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{busKnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{txnOrgCde,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{txnTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{subDte,jdbcType=DATE},
#{exeDte,jdbcType=DATE},
#{batSts,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fleNme,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{totCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{totAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{sucTotCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sucTotAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{falTotCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{falTotAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{payCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rsvFld1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rsvFld2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rsvFld3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rsvFld4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{rsvFld8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rsvFld9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{eupsBusTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO
TXN_MDE = #{txnMde,jdbcType=CHAR},
RAP_TYP = #{rapTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
COM_NO = #{comNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
COM_NME = #{comNme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_KND = #{busKnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
TXN_ORG_CDE = #{txnOrgCde,jdbcType=CHAR},
TXN_TLR = #{txnTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
SUB_DTE = #{subDte,jdbcType=DATE},
EXE_DTE = #{exeDte,jdbcType=DATE},
BAT_STS = #{batSts,jdbcType=CHAR},
FLE_NME = #{fleNme,jdbcType=CHAR},
TOT_CNT = #{totCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TOT_AMT = #{totAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUC_TOT_CNT = #{sucTotCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUC_TOT_AMT = #{sucTotAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FAL_TOT_CNT = #{falTotCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FAL_TOT_AMT = #{falTotAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_CNT = #{payCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RSV_FLD1 = #{rsvFld1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD2 = #{rsvFld2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD3 = #{rsvFld3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD4 = #{rsvFld4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD5 = #{rsvFld5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD6 = #{rsvFld6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD7 = #{rsvFld7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD8 = #{rsvFld8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_FLD9 = #{rsvFld9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EUPS_BUS_TYP = #{eupsBusTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where BAT_NO = #{batNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(TOT_CNT), 0) BATTOTCNT, COALESCE(SUM(TOT_AMT), 0) BATTOTAMT, COALESCE(SUM(SUC_TOT_CNT), 0) BATSUCCNT, COALESCE(SUM(SUC_TOT_AMT), 0) BATSUCTOTAME, COALESCE(SUM(FAL_TOT_CNT), 0) BATFALTOTCNT, COALESCE(SUM(FAL_TOT_AMT), 0) BATFALTOTAMT FROM GDEUPSB.GDEUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE COM_NO=#{comNo} AND SUB_DTE >= #{beginDate} AND SUB_DTE <= #{endDate}

SELECT DISTINCT A.*, B.SUM_SUC_TOT_CNT, B.SUM_SUC_TOT_AMT FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL A , (SELECT SUM(C.TOT_CNT) SUM_TOT_CNT, SUM(C.TOT_AMT) SUM_TOT_AMT, SUM(C.SUC_TOT_CNT) SUM_SUC_TOT_CNT, SUM(C.SUC_TOT_AMT) SUM_SUC_TOT_AMT, SUM(C.FAL_TOT_CNT) SUM_FAL_TOT_CNT, SUM(C.FAL_TOT_AMT) SUM_FAL_TOT_AMT FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO C WHERE COM_NO=#{comNo} AND SUB_DTE >=#{beginDte} AND SUB_DTE <=#{endDte}) b WHERE a.BAT_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT BAT_NO FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE COM_NO=#{comNo} AND SUB_DTE >=#{beginDte} AND SUB_DTE <=#{endDte}) AND STS='S'

SELECT DISTINCT A.*, B.SUM_FAL_TOT_CNT, B.SUM_FAL_TOT_AMT FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL A , (SELECT SUM(C.TOT_CNT) SUM_TOT_CNT, SUM(C.TOT_AMT) SUM_TOT_AMT, SUM(C.SUC_TOT_CNT) SUM_SUC_TOT_CNT, SUM(C.SUC_TOT_AMT) SUM_SUC_TOT_AMT, SUM(C.FAL_TOT_CNT) SUM_FAL_TOT_CNT, SUM(C.FAL_TOT_AMT) SUM_FAL_TOT_AMT FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO C WHERE COM_NO=#{comNo} AND SUB_DTE >=#{beginDte} AND SUB_DTE <=#{endDte}) b WHERE a.BAT_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT BAT_NO FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE COM_NO=#{comNo} AND SUB_DTE >=#{beginDte} AND SUB_DTE <=#{endDte}) AND STS !='S'

SELECT DISTINCT A.*, B.SUM_TOT_CNT, B.SUM_TOT_AMT, B.SUM_SUC_TOT_CNT, B.SUM_SUC_TOT_AMT, B.SUM_FAL_TOT_CNT, B.SUM_FAL_TOT_AMT FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL A , (SELECT SUM(C.TOT_CNT) SUM_TOT_CNT, SUM(C.TOT_AMT) SUM_TOT_AMT, SUM(C.SUC_TOT_CNT) SUM_SUC_TOT_CNT, SUM(C.SUC_TOT_AMT) SUM_SUC_TOT_AMT, SUM(C.FAL_TOT_CNT) SUM_FAL_TOT_CNT, SUM(C.FAL_TOT_AMT) SUM_FAL_TOT_AMT FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO C WHERE COM_NO=#{comNo} AND SUB_DTE >=#{beginDte} AND SUB_DTE <=#{endDte}) b WHERE a.BAT_NO IN (SELECT DISTINCT BAT_NO FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE COM_NO=#{comNo} AND SUB_DTE >=#{beginDte} AND SUB_DTE <=#{endDte})

SELECT * FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL WHERE BAT_NO IN (SELECT BAT_NO FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE RSV_FLD2 IN (SELECT RSV_FLD7 FROM GDEUPSB.GDEUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE EUPS_BUS_TYP=#{eupsBusTyp, jdbcType=CHAR} AND EXE_DTE >=#{beginDate, jdbcType=DATE} AND EXE_DTE <=#{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}))

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL WHERE BAT_NO IN (SELECT BAT_NO FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE RSV_FLD2 IN (SELECT RSV_FLD7 FROM GDEUPSB.GDEUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE EUPS_BUS_TYP=#{eupsBusTyp, jdbcType=CHAR} and EXE_DTE >=#{beginDate, jdbcType=DATE} AND EXE_DTE <=#{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}))

SELECT SQN, BAT_NO, COM_NO, TXN_TLR, SUB_DTE, CUS_AC, CUS_NME, TXN_AMT/100 TXN_AMT, THD_CUS_NO, THD_CUS_NME, OBK_BR, OUROTHFLG,RSV_FLD1, RSV_FLD2, RSV_FLD3, RSV_FLD4, RSV_FLD5, RSV_FLD6, RSV_FLD7, RSV_FLD8/100 RSV_FLD8, RSV_FLD9/100 RSV_FLD9, RSV_FLD10, RSV_FLD11, RSV_FLD12, RSV_FLD13, RSV_FLD14, RSV_FLD15, RSV_FLD16, RSV_FLD17, TOTCNT, TOTAMT, SUCTOTCNT, SUCTOTAMT, FALTOTCNT, FALTOTAMT FROM ( SELECT * FROM GDEUPSB.GDEUPS_ELEC_BATCH_TEMP WHERE BAT_NO IN( SELECT BAT_NO FROM GDEUPSB.GDEUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE EUPS_BUS_TYP=#{eupsBusTyp, jdbcType=CHAR} AND EXE_DTE=#{txnDte, jdbcType=DATE} AND BAT_STS='S')) A, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(TOT_CNT), 0) TOTCNT, COALESCE(SUM(TOT_AMT), 0)/100 TOTAMT, COALESCE(SUM(SUC_TOT_CNT), 0) SUCTOTCNT, COALESCE(SUM(SUC_TOT_AMT), 0)/100 SUCTOTAMT, COALESCE(SUM(FAL_TOT_CNT), 0) FALTOTCNT, COALESCE(SUM(FAL_TOT_AMT), 0)/100 FALTOTAMT FROM GDEUPSB.GDEUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE EUPS_BUS_TYP=#{eupsBusTyp, jdbcType=CHAR} AND EXE_DTE=#{txnDte, jdbcType=DATE} AND BAT_STS='S') B ORDER BY BAT_NO

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(TOT_CNT), 0) TOTCNT, COALESCE(SUM(TOT_AMT), 0)/100 TOTAMT, COALESCE(SUM(SUC_TOT_CNT), 0) SUCTOTCNT, COALESCE(SUM(SUC_TOT_AMT), 0)/100 SUCTOTAMT, COALESCE(SUM(FAL_TOT_CNT), 0) FALTOTCNT, COALESCE(SUM(FAL_TOT_AMT), 0)/100 FALTOTAMT FROM GDEUPSB.GDEUPS_BATCH_CONSOLE_INFO WHERE EUPS_BUS_TYP=#{eupsBusTyp, jdbcType=CHAR} AND EXE_DTE=#{txnDte, jdbcType=DATE} AND BAT_STS='S'
